org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.bridge.vertx2

Class VibeRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.bridge.vertx2.VibeRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<HttpServerRequest>

    public abstract class VibeRequestHandler
extends Object
implements Handler<HttpServerRequest>
    Handler to process HttpServerRequest into VertxServerHttpExchange. 

     httpServer.requestHandler(new VibeRequestHandler() {
     @Override
     protected Action<ServerHttpExchange> httpAction() {
         return server.httpAction();
     }
 });
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
